-	shop	EquipCab	111,18670:30000000,18683:30000000,18666:30000000,18677:30000000,18698:30000000,18665:30000000,18702:30000000,18678:30000000,18697:30000000,18754:30000000,5132:30000000,5563:30000000,18531:30000000,5334:30000000,5319:30000000,5317:30000000,5407:30000000,5474:30000000,5258:30000000,5086:30000000,5766:30000000,5132:30000000,5513:30000000,5512:30000000,5546:30000000,5545:30000000,5505:30000000,5531:30000000,5491:30000000,5416:30000000,5382:30000000,5765:30000000,5776:30000000,5778:30000000,5429:30000000,5827:30000000,5567:30000000,5378:30000000,5582:30000000,5581:30000000,5304:30000000,5744:30000000,5431:30000000,5609:30000000,5857:30000000,5498:30000000,5464:30000000

-	shop	Itens	111,12710:120000,12216:30000,12215:30000,12220:50000,985:15000,984:15000,12210:70000000,21044:1000000,21004:1500000,21005:1500000,21006:3000000,21007:3000000,21008:3000000,21009:3000000,21010:3000000,21011:3000000,21012:3000000,21013:3000000,21014:3000000,21015:30000000


vip,83,60,3	script	Mercado VIP	494,{

if (getgmlevel()<1) goto novip;

	mes "[ ^a60536Mercado Vip^000000 ]";
	mes "Olá ^FF0000"+strcharinfo(0)+"^000000,";
	mes "Deseja comprar qual tipo de itens?";
	switch( select("[^ff0000»^000000] Equipamentos Para a Cabeça","[^ff0000»^000000] Itens","Sair.")){

				case 1: // Equipamentos Para a Cabeça
					close2;
					callshop "EquipCab",0;
					end;

				case 2: // Itens
					close2;
					callshop "Itens",0;
					end;

				case 3:
					close;
	}

novip:
	mes "[ ^a60536Mercado Vip^000000 ]";
	mes "Lamento, mas você não é um usuário VIP.";
	mes "Acesse o site e veja como se tornar um vip!";
	close;

//OnInit:
//	waitingroom "Mercado VIP",0;
//end;
}
